analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees will undermine the long record of a professional and honest civil service that is one of the underpinnings of a American democracy and effectiveness.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the reclassification of career civil service employees, highlighting concerns about the politicization of the NIH and the potential negative impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which aligns with themes opposing the proposed rule.
